titleStmt.title: The way to the highest honour a funeral sermon, on John XII, 26, preach'd upon the decease of the Rnd Tho. Jacomb ... April 3, 1687 / by William Bates ...
titleStmt.author: Bates, William, 1625-1699.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
